body_html: I just had the same error compiling on Windows 10 with Cuda 10.0, the latest release of msys64, and the latest release of bazel. Just as @Spenhouet said, patch can't be found because msys doesn't have it by default for some reason.
body_text: I just had the same error compiling on Windows 10 with Cuda 10.0, the latest release of msys64, and the latest release of bazel. Just as @Spenhouet said, patch can't be found because msys doesn't have it by default for some reason.
body: I just had the same error compiling on Windows 10 with Cuda 10.0, the latest release of msys64, and the latest release of bazel. Just as @Spenhouet said, `patch` can't be found because msys doesn't have it by default for some reason.
